item.title: Learn 27 Ways to Make Money Online with Your Smartphone!
item.description: Would you like to make money online with your smartphone? Do you wanna see real money-making apps that pay in 2021? Then this course is PERFECT FOR YOU! I created this course because every single day people ask me for the best way to get paid just by using their smartphones. Learn just 1 strategy and you'll earn your course price back. The rest will be pure profits for you!

item.title: Learn about Credit and Credit Repair from Scratch
item.description:
Sadly, many people get into a debt spiral that soon goes out of control. They have trouble keeping their head above water, and soon they fall under as the weight of debt drags them down.
Thankfully, credit can be managed and all it takes is having the ability to change how one lives their life. By implementing the lessons explained in this course, an individual will be able to take their credit and repair it.
